mapper.select:
select COUNT(*) from tender_application a,project p where a.project_id=p.id
and p.project_name like "%"#{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"
and p.project_code like "%"#{projectCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"
and a.method=#{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select count(1) from purchase_request r,project p where r.status="10" AND r.project_id=p.id
and p.project_name like concat("%", #{projectName},"%")
and p.project_code like concat("%", #{projectCode},"%")
and r.method=#{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
